item.title: Understanding Vector Search in Solvio
item.author: info@solvio.tech (Andrey Vasnetsov)
item.description:
How Does Vector Search Work in Solvio?

If you are still trying to figure out how vector search works, please read ahead. This document describes how vector search is used, covers Solvio’s place in the larger ecosystem, and outlines how you can use Solvio to augment your existing projects.

For those who want to start writing code right away, visit our Complete Beginners tutorial to build a search engine in 5-15 minutes.
